row.Name: Description
row.Value: This package contains commonly used components and actions.

HEADER.Title: List of all available Configuration Objects

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
About Automic's Shared Package ==============================
This package contains a lot of common functionality that is used by various other packages. This code snippets take care of certain commonly needed functionality like retrieving error codes from a shell.

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = '' : PRINT ERROR: Directory name is required : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# ! <Begin of sudo script> :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
! Start execution : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
if [ -d "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Directory with name '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#' already exists." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO elif [ -f "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" ]; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "File with name '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#' already exists." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO exit 1; else : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
: SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS : SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
mkdir -p "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER ! <End of sudo script>

:IF &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR# = '' : PRINT ERROR: Directory name is required : EXIT 1 :ENDIF
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#
! Start execution : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
if ( Test-Path -Path "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" ) { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Directory/File with name '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#' already exists." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL } else { : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO New-Item -ItemType directory "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_CREATE_DIR#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL } __uc_return( 0 )

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory/file name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if missing" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0 :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#) :IF STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#) < 2 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "For security reasons the DirName must have at least 2 characters" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR errors=2 :ENDIF
!:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME" :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File/directory '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#' does not exist." : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR : IF &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL# = "Yes" errors=1 : ELSE exit 0 : ENDIF fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code if [ $ISDIR -eq 1 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Delete directory (recursive): &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO \rm -fr '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi
if [ $ISFILE -eq 1 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Delete file : &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO \rm -f '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#' : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.ACTION.UNPACK = General description = Extract a ZIP archive. = Inputs = * Archive name: The name of the archive file. * Extract location: The target directory to extract to. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if the extract location doesn't exist. * Return code is 2 if the archive doesn't exist. * Return code is 4 if not success.
= Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory to pack" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target archive" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite target" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking input parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! Check if Directory/File to pack exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] || [ $ISDIR -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist or not a directory" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ $EXIST -eq 1 ] then : IF &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# = 'No' : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target archive" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and overwrite flag set to No" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED# = &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED" \rm -fr "&UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED#" : ENDIF fi
if [ $errors -ne 0 ] then exit $errors fi
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Input parameters are valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PACK
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion @echo "&UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory to pack" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target archive" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Overwrite target" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET#
set /a errors=0 > nul
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking input parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! Check if Directory/File to pack exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exist but is not a directory" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) )
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %EXIST% == 1 ( : IF &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# = 'No' : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target archive" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "File &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and overwrite flag set to No" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED# = &UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED" del /F /Q "&UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET_ESCAPED#" : ENDIF )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Input parameters are valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PACK
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code

XHEADER.Title: Send a unicode parameter to Agent

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter value" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_VALUE#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER ! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export LC_CTYPE=en_US.UTF-8
targetFile="unicode_params_&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_ID#.txt" tempFile="unicode_params_&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_ID#.tmp" paramName='&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_NAME#' paramValue='&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_VALUE#'
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Unicode paramter is saved in $targetFile in the temp folder" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
cd .. mkdir -p temp cd temp/ !Write to a temp file printf "%s" "$paramName|||$paramValue" >> $tempFile filecharset=$(file -i $tempFile | awk -F'charset=|' '{print $2}') echo "File charset = $filecharset"
!Convert to UTF-8 if neccessary if [ "$filecharset" = "utf-8" ] then cp $tempFile $targetFile -f else echo "Converting to UTF-8" iconv -f $filecharset -t utf-8 $tempFile -o $targetFile fi
!Remove the temp file rm -f $tempFile
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_NAME#
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Parameter value" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_VALUE#
! Start execution :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL
$tempFile = "unicode_params_&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_ID#.txt" $paramName = "&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_NAME#" $paramValue = "&UC4_UNICODE_PARAM_VALUE#"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Unicode paramter is saved in $tempFile the temp folder" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO cd .. New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path "temp" cd temp "$paramName|||$paramValue" | Add-Content "$tempFile" -Encoding UTF8
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.STORE", "SHAREDTOOL.JAR", C, N
:SET &SHARED_TOOL_JAR# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"sharedtool.jar")

:IF &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,100 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "1" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER exit 1 fi if [ "$EXIST" -eq "0" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL fi

:IF &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : D &STRING_ARR#,string,100 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %ISFILE% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %EXIST% == 0 ( md "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE ) :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&SHARED_TOOL_JAR#" File Archive ? -s "&UC4RB_DIR_TO_PACK#" ? -t "&UC4RB_FILE_PACK_TARGET#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

HEADER.Title: Scan output variables in job report and publish them

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Look for output variables matching this pattern "OUTPUT :: {variable_name}={variable_value}" in the report. ! And PUBLISH those variables to TOP ! Remeber to set Generate at runtime = true in the parent job & the subsequent jobs
:SET &HANDLE# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,, "REP", "*OUTPUT :: *") :PROCESS &HANDLE#
: SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HANDLE#) : SET &length# = STR_LENGTH(&line#) : SET &left_delimiter_pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "OUTPUT :: ") : SET &variable_name_pos# = &left_delimiter_pos# + 10 ! 10 is Length of "OUTPUT :: " : SET &right_delimiter_pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "=") : SET &variable_value_pos# = &right_delimiter_pos# + 1 : SET &variable_name_length# = &right_delimiter_pos# - &variable_name_pos# !DEBUG START !: PRINT "left_delimiter_pos=&left_delimiter_pos#" !: PRINT "right_delimiter_pos=&right_delimiter_pos#" !: PRINT "variable_name_pos=&variable_name_pos#" !: PRINT "variable_name_length=&variable_name_length#" !: PRINT "variable_value_pos=&variable_value_pos#" !DEBUG END : SET &variable_name# = STR_CUT(&line#, &variable_name_pos#, &variable_name_length#) : IF &length# >= &variable_value_pos# : SET &variable_value# = STR_CUT(&line#, &variable_value_pos#) : ELSE : SET &variable_value# = "" : ENDIF !PUBLISH the variable value to a new object variable (without a leading & character). Double # is intented. : PUB &variable_value#,"&variable_name##",TOP : PRINT "FOUND & PUBLISH: &variable_name#=&variable_value#"
:ENDPROCESS
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#/sharedtool.jar" File Unarchive ? -s "&UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME#" ? -t "&UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR

:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :SET &JOB_TYPE# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR') :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" ! @echo off : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE cd /d "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" cd $HOME : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL cd "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

:SET &USE_SUDO# = "No" :SET &PARAM_USE_SUDO# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_USE_SUDO#) :SET &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#) :SET &PARAM_SUDO_USER# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#, UC4RB_SUDO_USER#) :SET &login_user# = get_att(USERID) :IF &PARAM_USE_SUDO# = "Sudo" : IF &login_user# <> "root" : IF &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# NE "" ! use SUDO with password : SET &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#="&PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD echo 'Validating sudoer ...' sudo -k sudo -S -p '' -v << EOF $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD EOF RC=$? if [ "$RC" -ne "0" ] ; then exit $RC fi : ELSE ! try with sudo nopass :SET &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" sudo -k sudo -p '' -v RC=$? if [ "$RC" -ne "0" ] ; then exit $RC fi ! use SUDO but didn't input SUDO_PASSWORD echo WARNING: SUDO password is blank, make sure that the current user has SUDO privileges WITHOUT password. : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF

! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different UNIX variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or does not exist CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME#" ISDIR=0 ISFILE=0 EXIST=0 if [ -d "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISDIR=1 EXIST=1 else if [ -f "$CHECKME" ] ; then ISFILE=1 EXIST=1 fi fi :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR:$ISDIR ISFILE:$ISFILE EXIST:$EXIST" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO

! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CHECKME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS !Double qoutes are required. Otherwise, a string containing & will corrupt the command. !If %CHECKME% is used to subtitue the UC4 variable &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, !file path containing & or ( or ) won't be detected correctly !SET CHECKME="&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" SET ISFILE=0 SET ISDIR=0 SET EXIST=0 if exist "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" ( SET EXIST=1 if exist "&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#\" ( SET ISDIR=1 ) else ( SET ISFILE=1 ) ) else ( SET EXIST=0 )
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR(%ISDIR%) ISFILE(%ISFILE%) EXIST(%EXIST%)" echo &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
cd "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL

! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# ! different Windows variable are set if the object is a directory, a file or doesn't exist :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME#, '"', '""') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#, '$', '`$') $CHECKME="&UC4RB_CHECKME_ESCAPED#" $ISFILE="0" $ISDIR="0" $EXIST=Test-Path $CHECKME if ($EXIST -eq $True) { $EXIST="1" $ISDIR=Test-Path $CHECKME -pathtype container if ($ISDIR -eq $True) { $ISDIR="1" } else { $ISDIR="0" $ISFILE="1" } } else { $EXIST="0" } :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# is checked for being a dir/file and if it exist" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "ISDIR($ISDIR) ISFILE($ISFILE) EXIST($EXIST)" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "------------------------------" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO

:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\", "/") :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#)
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:WHILE &END_CHAR# = "/" OR "\" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : IF &END_CHAR# <> ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE

:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "/", "\") :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#)
:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:WHILE &END_CHAR# = "/" OR "\" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : IF &END_CHAR# <> ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE

:SET &today# = "&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &ret# = CREATE_OBJECT("VARA","&variableName#","&variablePath#") :IF &ret# = 0 : PUT_VAR PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.VARA.REMEMBER_ALL_VARIABLES, "&variableName#", "&today#", "&variablePath#" :ENDIF

:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :SET &JOB_TYPE# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR') :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#)
:SET &DECRYPT_COMMAND# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#sharedtool.jar" cipher Password -c decrypt -t "&UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP#"' :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" ! @echo off : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=((&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | findstr.exe /B Decrypted:).substring(11)).Trim() : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE for /F "tokens=1 delims=^" %%a IN ('&DECRYPT_COMMAND# ^| findstr.exe /B Decrypted:') DO ( set UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=%%a SetLocal EnableDelayedExpansion set UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=!UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD:~11! SetLocal DisableDelayedExpansion ) : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD=`&DECRYPT_COMMAND# | grep "^Decrypted: " | sed 's/^Decrypted: //'` : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

if [ -d "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#" ] ; then echo "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# directory already exists" else mkdir -p "&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#" fi :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL

! not complete, more characters might need a escape sequence :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '\', '\\') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '!', '\!') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '@', '\@') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '$', '\$') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '^', '\^') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '&', '\&') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '(', '\(') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ')', '\)') ! :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, ' ', '\ ')

:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '^', '^^') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '|', '^|') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '&', '^&') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '>', '^>') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '<', '^<') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '%', '%%') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '"', '\"') :SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#, '!', '^!')

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[], SIZE)
:WHILE &VAR# LT &LEN# : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "ERROR:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "ERROR" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING#[&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER#]: &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "echo" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "Write-Host" : ENDIF :ENDIF &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "** EXECUTION START **" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD ""

:SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "echo" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD = "Write-Host" : ENDIF :ENDIF &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "** PARAMETER VALIDATION START **" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD "********************************" &UC4RB_ECHO_CMD ""

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "INFO:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# = "PARAM:" :SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL#, '"', '""') : IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '`', '``') Write-Host "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_POWERSHELL : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#, '%', '%%') echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAM_VAL_ESCAPED#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE : ENDIF :ENDIF :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# : SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS echo "&UC4RB_LOGGING_STRING# &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#" : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :ENDIF

:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "\" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "/", "\") :ELSE : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "/" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_SUBSTITUTE (&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "\", "/") :ENDIF
! Warning, this script doesn't work with Windows Universal Naming Convention :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[],SIZE)
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" <> ".." OR "." OR "" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : ELSE : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" EQ ".." : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

! 1 - set the AGENT variable (value or from outside) ! 2 - does the AGENT exist ! 3 - does the objectname end with @TARGET_SYSTEM ! 4 - compare objectname TARGET_SYSTEM with agent variable UC_HOST_JCL_VAR (exception CIT => RA) ! 5 - get AGENT bin directory ! 6 - set LOGIN OBJECT variable (value or from outside) !------------------------------
! 1 a - ensure the AGENT variable is set :SET &AGENT_VALUE# = "AGENT#" :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&AGENT_VALUE#) :IF &AGENT# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: no agent received" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 0 :ELSE : PRINT "HEADER: set agent from outside (like RM): &AGENT#" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 :ENDIF
! 1 b - check whether the AGENT is overwritten (filetransfer for example) :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_AGENT#" :SET &OVERWRITE_AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_AGENT_VALUE#) :SET &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &OVERWRITE_AGENT#) :IF &OVERWRITE_AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "HEADER: overwrite agent with: &OVERWRITE_AGENT# (&UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS#)" : SET &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_AGENT_OS# : SET &AGENT# = &OVERWRITE_AGENT# :ENDIF
! 2 - check whether the AGENT exists :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OHIDNR# = GET_OH_IDNR(&AGENT#,0000) : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OHIDNR# = 0 !: STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: host &AGENT# doesnt exist" : PRINT "HEADER: host &AGENT# doesnt exist" : ENDIF :ENDIF
! 3 - check the uc4 object name for "@TARGET_SYSTEM" :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_RBNAME# = SYS_ACT_ME_NAME() : SET &UC4RB_TEMP# = STR_FIND(&UC4RB_RBNAME#,"@") : IF &UC4RB_TEMP# = 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: runbook without @TARGET_SYSTEM in the name is not allowed" : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_TEMP# = ADD(&UC4RB_TEMP#,1) : SET &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = MID(&UC4RB_RBNAME#,&UC4RB_TEMP#) : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "CIT" : SET &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = "RA" : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# <> "RA" OR "WINDOWS" OR "UNIX" : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: wrong object name ending. @TARGET_SYSTEM must be RA, WINDOWS or UNIX" : ENDIF : PRINT "HEADER: runbook function for &UC4RB_TARGET_OS#" :ENDIF
! 4 - check whether UC4RB_AGENT_OS is set and compare to the runbook TARGET_OS value :IF &UC4RB_SET_EXTERNAL# = 1 : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS_VALUE# = "UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&UC4RB_AGENT_OS_VALUE#) : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: runbook runs stand alone - no OS check" : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&UC4RB_TARGET_OS#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &UC4RB_TARGET_OS# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) :ENDIF
! 5 - get AGENT bin directory :SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) :PRINT "HEADER: agent bin directory &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#"
! 6a - check if Login os overwritten :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE# = "OVERWRITE_LOGIN#" :SET &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&OVERWRITE_LOGIN_VALUE#) :IF &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "HEADER: overwrite login with: &OVERWRITE_LOGIN#" : SET &LOGIN# = &OVERWRITE_LOGIN# :ENDIF
! 6b - set Login Object :SET &LOGIN_VALUE# = "LOGIN#" :SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR(&LOGIN_VALUE#) :IF &LOGIN# = "" : PRINT "HEADER: no login object received" :ELSE : PRINT "HEADER: set login object from outside (like RM): &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) :ENDIF

!get the agent OS type :SET &AGENT# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("AGENT#")
:IF &AGENT# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting agent to &AGENT#" :ELSE : SET &AGENT# = GET_ATT(HOST) : PRINT "JOB: agent is preconfigured to &AGENT#" :ENDIF
:PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN#

:IF &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" EOF :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = GET_PUBLISHED_VALUE(&$RUNID#,UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORD#) :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD :IF &PARAM_SUDO_PASSWORD# NE "" sudo -k sudo -S -s -p '' <<EOF $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF :ELSE sudo -k sudo -s -p '' <<EOF $SHELL &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# EOF :ENDIF :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL rm -f '&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE#' :ENDIF

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_SUDOERS :IF &USE_SUDO# = "Yes" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_BIN', &AGENT#) : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#/../temp/" ! Normalize file path : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR" : SET &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_DIR#/sudo&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.sh" echo "Creating temp file to sudo at &UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# ..." cat - 1>&UC4RB_AGENT_TEMP_SUDO_FILE# <<'EOF' :ENDIF
:SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&ABSOLUTE_PATH#, "/") :IF &pos# <> 1 : SET &ABSOLUTE_PATH# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#/&ABSOLUTE_PATH#" :ENDIF
:SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&ABSOLUTE_PATH#, ":") :IF &pos# <> 2 : SET &ABSOLUTE_PATH# = "&UC4RB_AGENT_WORKING_DIR#\&ABSOLUTE_PATH#" :ENDIF

:IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "\" :ELSE : SET &SEPARATOR_CHAR# = "/" :ENDIF
! Warning, this script doesn't work with Windows Universal Naming Convention :FILL &STRING_ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = ""
:SET &VAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&STRING_ARR#[])
:WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" <> ".." OR "." OR "" : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" : IF &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &STRING_ARR#[&VAR#] : ENDIF : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, "&SEPARATOR_CHAR#&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]") : ENDIF : ELSE : IF "&STRING_ARR#[&VAR#]" EQ ".." : SET &POS# = STR_FIND_REVERSE(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &SEPARATOR_CHAR#) : SET &POS# = &POS# - 1 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &POS#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

:SET &LENGTH# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#); :IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) :ELSE : SET &END_CHAR# = "" :ENDIF
:WHILE &END_CHAR# = "/" OR "\" : SET &LENGTH# = &LENGTH# - 1 : IF &LENGTH# > 0 : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : IF &END_CHAR# <> ":" : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, 1, &LENGTH#) : SET &END_CHAR# = STR_CUT(&UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#, &LENGTH#, 1) : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDWHILE

HEADER.Title: yes|no in the prompt, true| false in value

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.ACTION.START_SERVICE
= General description = Start a preconfigured Windows service/Unix deamon by its name.
= Inputs = * Service name: For Windows: name of the service - executes the NET START "servicename" command For Unix: script with full path in your init.d folder to call (e.g.: /etc/init.d/apache2)
= Behavior = (See General description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is > 0 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER "&UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#" start :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
net start "&UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*already been started.") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"already been started.") : IF &pos# > 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS

PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR: <dialog height="424" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="441"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Start Service"><properties><entry name="text">Start Service</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SERVICE_NAMEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Service name" tooltip="" upper="0" required="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Service name</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SERVICE_NAMEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip"/><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="resetable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="onchangereset"/></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.ACTION.STOP_SERVICE
= General description = Stop a preconfigured Windows service/Unix deamon by its name.
= Inputs = * Service name: For Windows: name of the service - executes the NET START "servicename" command For Unix: script with full path in your init.d folder to call (e.g.: /etc/init.d/apache2)
= Behavior = (See General description)
= Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is > 0 if not success.
= Rollback = (none)
= Logging = (none)
= Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER "&UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#" stop :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION
net stop "&UC4RB_SERVICE_NAME#" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI: :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*is not started.") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"is not started.") : IF &pos# > 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=0 : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS

XHEADER.Title: Transfer file using agent-to-agent file transfer job

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# <> "" : PUT_ATT FT_SRC_HOST = &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# :ELSE : PUT_ATT FT_SRC_HOST = "<WIN>" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# <> "" : PUT_ATT FT_SRC_LOGIN = &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_SRC_FILE = "&UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#"
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# <> "" : PUT_ATT FT_DST_HOST = &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# :ELSE : PUT_ATT FT_DST_HOST = "<WIN>" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# <> "" : PUT_ATT FT_DST_LOGIN = &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_DST_FILE = "&UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#"
:IF &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# = "Yes" : PUT_ATT FT_EXISTING_DST_FILE = "O" :ELSE : PUT_ATT FT_EXISTING_DST_FILE = "A" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_REMOVE_SOURCE# = "Yes" : PUT_ATT FT_ERASE_SRC_FILE = "Y" :ELSE : PUT_ATT FT_ERASE_SRC_FILE = "N" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT FT_WILDCARDS = "N" :PUT_ATT FT_INCLUDE_SUB_DIR = "N" :PUT_ATT FT_TRANSFER_FOLDERS = "N"

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# <> '' : SET &AGENT# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Source Agent must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# <> '' : SET &LOGIN# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Source Login Object must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
! get the agent OS type :PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :SET &PROMPTSET# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.PROMPTSET.TRANSFER_FILE" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUES_FROM_CONFIG

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking source parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
! Check if source archive file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Directory/File &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 else if [ "$ISFILE" -eq "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 fi fi
if [ $errors -ne 0 ] then exit $errors fi :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Source parameter is valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# <> '' : SET &AGENT# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_AGENT# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Source Agent must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# <> '' : SET &LOGIN# = &UC4RB_SOURCE_LOGIN# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Source Login Object must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF

:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :SET &PROMPTSET# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.PROMPTSET.TRANSFER_FILE" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUES_FROM_CONFIG

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking source parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO set /a errors=0 > nul
! Check if source archive file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) ) if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Source parameter is valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :PUBLISH &UC4RB_SOURCE_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW"

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# <> '' : SET &AGENT# = &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Target Agent must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# <> '' : SET &LOGIN# = &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Target Login Object must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
! get the agent OS type :PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN# :SET &PROMPTSET# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.PROMPTSET.TRANSFER_FILE" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUES_FROM_CONFIG

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_TARGET_FILE"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking target parameter..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
:SET &UC4RB_PARENT_DIR# = &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_PARENT_DIR" echo "Ensure directory &UC4RB_PARENT_DIR# can be created in agent host &AGENT#" cd "&UC4RB_PARENT_DIR#" RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then mkdir -p "&UC4RB_PARENT_DIR#" fi RC=$? if [ "$RC" -gt "0" ] ; then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# is invalid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER exit $RC; fi
!Check if target file exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = "&UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
:IF &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# = "No" if [ $EXIST -eq 1 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and Overwrite Target parameter is 'No'" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=1 fi :ENDIF
if [ $errors -ne 0 ] then exit $errors fi
chmod -R 777 "&UC4RB_PARENT_DIR#" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Target parameter is valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :PUBLISH &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

PRE_SCRIPT.PSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# <> '' : SET &AGENT# = &UC4RB_TARGET_AGENT# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Target Agent must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# <> '' : SET &LOGIN# = &UC4RB_TARGET_LOGIN# :ELSE : STOP MSG, 50, "WORKFLOW: Target Login Object must be preconfigured!" :ENDIF
! get the agent OS type :PSET &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = GET_VAR('UC_HOST_JCL_VAR', &AGENT#) :PRINT "WORKFLOW: &AGENT# agent runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#"
:SET &UC_WIN_TYP = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("UC_WIN_TYP") :PRINT "WIN_TYP: &UC_WIN_TYP"
:SET &JOB_TYPE# = "INVALID - JOB Object Type" :IF &UC_WIN_TYP = "BAT" OR "KDO" OR "EXTCOMPROC" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "WINDOWS" :ELSE : SET &UC_UNIX_TYPE = GET_ATT("UNIX_TYPE") : PRINT "UNIX_TYPE: &UC_UNIX_TYPE" : IF &UC_UNIX_TYPE = "SHELL_SCRIPT" OR "COMMAND" : SET &JOB_TYPE# = "UNIX" : ENDIF :ENDIF
:IF &JOB_TYPE# = &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# : PRINT "HEADER: check OS successfully - runbook (&JOB_TYPE#) runs on &UC4RB_AGENT_OS#" : PUT_ATT HOST = &AGENT# :ELSE : STOP NOMSG, 50, "HEADER: stop &JOB_TYPE# runbook because it's a &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# agent" :ENDIF
:SET &LOGIN# = GET_SCRIPT_VAR("LOGIN#")
:IF &LOGIN# <> "" : PRINT "JOB: setting login to &LOGIN#" :ELSE : SET &LOGIN# = GET_ATT(LOGIN) : PRINT "JOB: login is preconfigured to &LOGIN#" :ENDIF
:PUT_ATT LOGIN = &LOGIN#
:SET &PROMPTSET# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.PROMPTSET.TRANSFER_FILE" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SIEBEL.PRV.INCLUDE.GET_VALUES_FROM_CONFIG

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off ! setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_TARGET_FILE" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking target parameter..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO set /a errors=0 > nul :SET &UC4RB_PARENT_DIR# = &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.GET_DIRECTORY_FROM_FILE_NAME "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_PARENT_DIR" echo "Ensure directory &UC4RB_PARENT_DIR# can be created in agent host &AGENT#" cd /d "&UC4RB_PARENT_DIR#" > nul @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 mkdir "&UC4RB_PARENT_DIR#" @set retcode=%errorlevel% @if NOT %ERRORLEVEL% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# is invalid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER goto :retcode )
! Check if target file exists : SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE# : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
:IF &UC4RB_OVERWRITE_TARGET# = "No" if %EXIST% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Target File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Target file &UC4RB_CHECKME# already existed and Overwrite Target parameter is 'No'" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) :ENDIF
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Target parameter is valid" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :PUBLISH &UC4RB_TARGET_FILE#,,"WORKFLOW"

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= RB name = PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.ACTION.UNPACK = General description = Extract a ZIP archive. = Inputs = * Archive name: The name of the archive file. * Extract location: The target directory to extract to. = Behavior = (see general description) = Outputs = * Return code is 0 if success * Return code is 1 if the extract location doesn't exist. * Return code is 2 if the archive doesn't exist. * Return code is 4 if not success.
= Rollback = (none) = Logging = (none) = Example = (none)

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION
:DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Extract location" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# ! apply sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER errors=0
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking input parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! Check if File to unpack exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=2 else if [ $ISFILE -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER errors=4 fi fi
!Check and create the target directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# if not found" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_UNIX
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_UNIX_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_UNIX_SHELL ! sudo :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER !End my code

:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCES @echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_PARAM_VALIDATION ! Normalize inputs :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#,string,30 :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET"
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Archive name" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Extract location" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET#
set /a errors=0 > nul
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Checking input parameters..." :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO
! Check if File to unpack exists :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Source file &UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) else ( if %ISFILE% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Source File" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a file " : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=4 > nul ) )
! Check and create the target directory :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "Create directory &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# if not found" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_INFO :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET# :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ENSURE_DIRECTORY_EXISTS_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode )
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_HEADER_EXECUTION !Begin my code
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHANGE_FOLDER_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_NAME" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WINDOWS_CHARS "UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING" = "UC4RB_DIR_FI_UNPACK_TARGET" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.UNPACK :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE !End my code
